item.title: I need major help on my very first server
item.dc:creator: @Carson Carson
item.description:
@Carson wrote:

Go to Char .java

Find your username, double click it.

Go to Play Rights, Change it too…

1 For Mod. 2 For Admin. 3 For Owner. 4 For Hidden-Crown-Admin.

Read full topic

item.title: I need major help on my very first server
item.dc:creator: @halodrag13 halodrag13
item.description:
@halodrag13 wrote:

i just added something on to my client.java file i added 2 new codes at the very bottom of it i added one that gave 100kfrayrg bones and when i hit double click compile this comes upclient.java:30268: class, interface, or enum expected if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pray") ^ client.java:30271: class, interface, or enum expected sendMessage("99 pray ftw!); ^ client.java:30271: unclosed string literal sendMessage("99 pray ftw!); ^ client.java:30276: class, interface, or enum expected addItem(4892 , 1); ^ client.java:30277: class, interface, or enum expected addItem(4898 , 1); ^ client.java:30278: class, interface, or enum expected addItem(4934 , 1); ^ client.java:30279: class, interface, or enum expected addItem(4740 , 999999999); ^ client.java:30280: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:30283: class, interface, or enum expected addItem(7158 , 999999999); ^ client.java:30284: class, interface, or enum expected addItem(3140 , 999999999); ^ client.java:30285: class, interface, or enum expected addItem(4088 , 999999999); ^ client.java:30286: class, interface, or enum expected addItem(3141 , 999999999); ^ client.java:30287: class, interface, or enum expected addItem(4588 , 999999999); ^ client.java:30288: class, interface, or enum expected addItem(1703 , 999999999); ^ client.java:30289: class, interface, or enum expected }→ ^ 15 errors Press any key to continue . . .
can someone tell me how to fix this this is what i added into the botom of my client.java} if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pray") { addItem(4831,100000); sendMessage("99 pray ftw!); } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("ryan") { addItem(4880 , 1); addItem(4892 , 1); addItem(4898 , 1); addItem(4934 , 1); addItem(4740 , 999999999); } {if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("rich") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("halo man 21")) addItem(5699 , 999999999); addItem(7158 , 999999999); addItem(3140 , 999999999); addItem(4088 , 999999999); addItem(3141 , 999999999); addItem(4588 , 999999999); addItem(1703 , 999999999); }
can someone help me?

Read full topic
